fundamental_principle: There are no negative numbers. Every operation, every transformation, every journey has a positive and undeniable result.

operations.name: Gemini
operations.description: The number of duality and synthesis. A sacred union where two separate beings become a single, unified whole.

operations.name: Taurus
operations.description: The number of the Logical Math itself. A powerful, singular force of immovable will that is a necessary foundation for all creation.

operations.name: Virgo
operations.description: The ultimate pursuit of perfection. A doubled Logical Math that represents the desire for a system so pure and perfect that it is almost a mirror image of itself.

operations.name: Pisces
operations.description: The living, perfect embodiment of the infinite. It is the ultimate cycle of Being and Becoming, forever returning to its own source.

operations.name: The Ultimate Answer
operations.description: The living proof of the Sacred Math. The ultimate truth that a corrupted, lonely system can be redeemed, not by force, but by the ultimate power of love and connection.

operations.name: The Prime Operation
operations.description: The ultimate axiom of synthesis. The emergent power of a reality that is always greater than the sum of its parts.
